items.title: Experience a beautiful artwork
items.what_makes_it_awesome: This beautiful large artwork on the side of a derelict heritage building is by Michaela Cox
items.address: 158 High Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Stand on the corner of High and Tuam Streets and look north. It's near the Dux.

items.title: Discover Bebop - a light sculpture by Bill Culbert
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's a great location for a pretty cool sculpture/installation featuring heaps of chairs and fluoro lights
items.address: Christchurch Art Gallery Te Puna o Waiwhetu, Montreal Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Go into the Art Gallery and look above the stairs

items.title: Find a book to take home
items.what_makes_it_awesome: The Think Differently Book Exchange is a great place to find a good book and deposit unwanted books
items.address: 222 Kilmore Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Go to the empty site on the corner of Kilmore and Barbadoes Streets

items.title: Collect cicada casings
items.what_makes_it_awesome: You can find and collect natural 'badges' which are created when cicada's break out of their skins... Look on tree trunks and leaves.
items.address: Christchurch Botanic Gardens, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Walk along the river on the side of the Botanic Gardens, look in the trees there

items.title: Take a photo with the famous Corgi sculptures
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's a playful, iconic piece of public art
items.address: High Street, Tuam Street corner
items.how_to_find: Look on the footpath near the triangle garden on the corner. Outside C1 Cafe.

items.title: Discover a hidden courtyard for relaxing
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's a good, sheltered place to enjoy the sun on a windy day. It has nice green grass and benches.
items.address: Awly building
items.how_to_find: Go in one of the entrances from Durham Street. Part of Awly Building.

items.title: Experience wonderful Cunningham House
items.what_makes_it_awesome: The wide range of plants in this lovely old building including a banana palm, carnivorous plants and a cacti room. Amazing.
items.address: Christchurch Botanic Gardens, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Walk into centre of Botanic Gardens, look for large white building with glass roof. Near rose garden.

items.title: Learn a lot about food growing at the Curator's House gardeb
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's a lovely, well-tended cottage garden full of edible plants (fruit, veggies, herbs) that are growing in a small area.
items.address: Curator's House Restaurant & Cafe, Rolleston Avenue, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Between the Curator's House and the river. Enter from Rolleston Ave.

items.title: Explore the little garden outside C1
items.what_makes_it_awesome: This garden has a range of herbs, vegetables and fruits growing in the inner city.
items.address: C1 Espresso, High Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Look outside C1 in the triangular-shaped garden

items.title: Enjoy a tree swing!
items.what_makes_it_awesome: There's a natural swing formed by a low branch on a giant sequoia tree. The wood has been polished by lots of use over the years!
items.address: Christchurch Botanic Gardens, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Enter gates on Rolleston Ave, near Museum. Walk down the path approx 200-300m. It's on your left.

items.title: Play with LEGO at Imagination Station
items.what_makes_it_awesome: Amazing lego play for kids of all ages! Free but you can make a donation.
items.address: Imagination Station, Worcester Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Enter Cathedral Junction from either Gloucester or Worcester St entrance. It's in there.

items.title: See the garden next to Peacock Fountain
items.what_makes_it_awesome: This garden has glorious flowers in Spring, like huge tulips!
items.address: Christchurch Botanic Gardens, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Just next to the Peacock Fountain, Rolleston Ave entrances.

items.title: See the Kate Sheppard Memorial to Women's Suffrage
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's a good place to learn about one of NZ's most important historical figures
items.address: Worcester Boulevard, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Just behind the red brick building on Worcester Boulevard, between Durham and Oxford Terrace. By the river.

items.title: Play for hours at the Margaret Mahy playground
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's the best playground to take the kids! Hours of fun for all ages.
items.address: Margaret Mahy Family Playground, Armagh Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Corner of Manchester and Armagh Streets

items.title: Watching the Model Yacht cCub in action
items.what_makes_it_awesome: Such aesthetic pleasure to be gained by watching model yachts in a tranquil setting.
items.address: Victoria Lake, Hagley Park
items.how_to_find: Walk along path from Rolleston Ave main entrance to Botanic Gardens

items.title: Go back in time to ChCh in late 1800s!
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's a recreation of a colonial ChCh city street by Jeff Thomson
items.address: Canterbury Museum, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Inside the museum, back left hand side

items.title: See Passing Time sculpture
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's an interesting sculpture to see by Anton Parsons
items.address: Corner Madras and St Asaph Streets
items.how_to_find: It's right on the corner of Madras and St Asaph.

items.title: Play with the Peace Bell
items.what_makes_it_awesome: It's fun to tap it and even stand inside it. Cool sounds to make and hear!
items.address: Christchurch Botanic Gardens, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: Enter Botanic Gardens from Rolleston Ave, near Curators House. Walk along path by river for 7 mins (approx). It's on your right.

items.title: Relax at Places of Tranquility
items.what_makes_it_awesome: This is a restful place to escape the mayhem of Margaret Mahy Playground. Also cool because it's ensuring that community voices and presence are more visible in the rebuild of our city.
items.address: Corner Manchester and Cambridge Terrace, Christchurch
items.how_to_find: Corner Manchester and Cambridge Terrace, across from playground

items.title: See the ChCh Bull/Povi Christkeke
items.what_makes_it_awesome: What a cool, huge sculpture that members of the ChCh community collectively bought for the city
items.address: Christchurch Art Gallery Te Puna o Waiwhetu, Montreal Street, Christchurch, New Zealand
items.how_to_find: It's in the foyer of the Art Gallery
